ygData.subject: [eqbards] Wow - o - wow
ygData.msgSnippet: Well twinkie bardette had a good weekend!  I am finally a mana-battery! *cheers* Also got her an erudite mask and thank god its a good face cuz Tani s guise
ygData.messageBody:
Well twinkie bardette had a good weekend! I am finally a mana-battery!
*cheers*

Also got her an erudite mask and thank god its a good face cuz Tani's guise
gives her the ugliest DE face (Hally has the second ugliest!) so I'm glad I
got a good one for a change! [insert anti-twink comments here]

For those of you looking for good xp in the early 30s, try the giant
fortress in Frontier Mountains... its OMG good xp. We had a balanced group
(31 bard, 31 monk, 34 warrior, 27 cleric) and pretty much fought nonstop.
Set up shop right inside. Got just over a bubble an hour but you gotta
watch out for those Mountain Giant Craigs (ouch!).

Did anyone participate in the ToT finals on test? Hear they were great
fights!!! My guild got bumped out after a couple rounds to a PvP team but
weere still happy :)

Hope everyone had a good weekend :)

Tani, 32nd Bardette-mana-battery
Halana, 57th Shaman
Solusek Ro
